comment: Builder class to construct the {@link EntityConfig} object.

methods.name: public Builder setIncludedTypes(@Nullable Collection<String> includedTypes)
methods.comment: * Sets a collection of types that are explicitly included.

methods.name: public Builder setExcludedTypes(@Nullable Collection<String> excludedTypes)
methods.comment: * Sets a collection of types that are explicitly excluded.

methods.name: public Builder includeTypesFromTextClassifier(boolean includeTypesFromTextClassifier)
methods.comment:
* Specifies whether or not to include the types suggested by the text classifier. By
             * default, it is included.

methods.name: public Builder setHints(@Nullable Collection<String> hints)
methods.comment:
* Sets the hints for the TextClassifier to determine what types of entities to find.
             * These hints will only be used if {@link #includeTypesFromTextClassifier} is
             * set to be true.

methods.name: public EntityConfig build()
methods.comment:
* Combines all of the options that have been set and returns a new {@link EntityConfig}
             * object.
